activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6748
activity.text: The bed eafefo was created on "2022-07-15T12:44:16.229074+05:30". Can the problem be related to the creation date of that bed?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6748
activity.text:
@rithviknishad 
I have a doubt regarding this issue. When I try to assign or switch a patient to another bed, the feature works perfectly fine. However, the error only occurs with the bed you provided (eafefo). I even attempted to create new patients and assign them to that bed (eafofo), but it still throws the same error. There doesn't seem to be any issue with the new beds created. Is it possible that the problem lies only with that specific bed, or am I missing something?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6479
activity.text:
Hey @nihal467 
The NIBP of a patient will only be displayed if it's measured after the current bed assignment date. I think the details for the patient you provided in the above link were updated on October 27th, and then the bed was switched later.
Please correct me if I'm mistaken.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6479
activity.text:
hey @rithviknishad 
I've made some updates to the central nursing station component based on the requirements. I believe it might need a review. Please take a look and let me know if I've taken the right approach.

I've used the useEffect function to fetch the BedAssignmentStartDates of all the patients in the facility. This required two request calls to fetch the required data. However, I'm not certain if I've provided the data to the HL7PatientVitalsMonitor component in the correct order.

Please review the code when you get a chance.
